item.title: About
item.description:
Personal Information

  • Full Name: Ho√†ng D∆∞∆°ng
  • Occupation: Fourth-year student, Information Technology
  • Email: nguuyen1801@gmail.com
  • Instagram: Instagram
  • GitHub: GitHub

Overview

I am a fourth-year Information Technology student at Thuyloi University. Throughout my studies, I have gained solid knowledge of programming languages such as JavaScript, HTML, and CSS ü¶ñ, along with hands-on experience in web development, databases, and DevOps.

Experience & Projects

  • Project Name: A 360-degree web project that allows users to explore tourist attractions in an immersive and interactive way. It uses krpano to display panoramic images and integrates hotspots to provide detailed information or links to booking pages and travel blogs. The platform supports PC, mobile, and VR headsets such as Meta Quest 2.
  • Internship at CodeZX: Worked with Google Cloud Platform, Terraform, Microservices, Java Spring Boot, etc. Contributed to the development of ocr-dev.codezx.vn.

Skills

  • Programming Languages: JavaScript (React ü¶ñ, Node.js), Python (ComfyUI, Stable Diffusion), SQL (PostgreSQL)
  • Technologies & Tools: Docker, Jenkins, Terraform ü¶ñ, Git, CI/CD
  • Databases: PostgreSQL (SQL), MongoDB (NoSQL)
  • Software Development Methodologies: Scrum

Career Goals

I aspire to become a Backend Developer while also exploring DevOps Engineering, where I can apply my knowledge and skills to real-world systems, contribute to business growth, and continuously enhance my expertise.

Contact

If you are interested in my profile, feel free to reach out via Email or Instagram for further discussion! Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to connecting and collaborating in the future! üöÄ
